items.name: Excalibur
items.description: Longsword symbolizing divine right to rule, power, and justice in Arthurian lore

items.name: Lightsaber
items.description: A lightsaber is a fictional energy sword featured throughout Star Wars.

items.name: Mjolnir
items.description: Mj√∂lnir is the hammer of the thunder god Thor in Norse mythology, used both as a devastating weapon and as a divine instrument to provide blessings.

users.name: King Arthur
users.description: King Arthur was a legendary king of Britain. He is a folk hero and a central figure in the medieval literary tradition known as the Matter of Britain.

users.name: Obi Wan Kenobi
users.description: Obi-Wan Kenobi is a wise, and compassionate Jedi Master in the Star Wars universe, acting as a pivotal mentor to Anakin and Luke Skywalker.

users.name: Thor
users.description: Thor is the prominent Norse god of thunder, lightning, storms, and fertility, acting as the fierce protector of Asgard (gods) and Midgard (humans).

collection.name: Sarah Zareski's API
collection.creator: SarahZareski
collection.about: A collection of weapons and their corresponding warriors.
